attributes.action: Discuss Minimum Wage for Family Carers&Secondary Pension
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The above says it all, for unpaid carers such as myself and thousands more, having to live on income support, and when our caring days are over, Services beeing created on the back of Carer Poverty.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
